segments.text: Why do you want to spend your summer days in a mountain village ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think a mountain village is splendid !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't agree with you . It's too small to live .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It has fresh air , and it is nicer than a big town .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I disagree , a big town is more lively .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I like the small mountain village . The big town is noisy . How charming it is when walking along the hill !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , alright , I agree with you about that , but I still prefer a big town .
segments.speaker: S1
